name: Hurry Up !
description:
Hurry Up ! is a game where YOU are the programmer who participe to the Ludum Dare !

You have to create your game within the time allowed to win the game.
Just one tip : be reactive !

Game made by Mathieu C. AKA Mahtiouza in 14 h for #LD37
Musics generated by http://www.fakemusicgenerator.com/
Sounds generated by SFRX.

The game got a 3.34 / 5 on #LD37 ! You can check out all its results here.

(If you want the post-mortem edition for 0$, you can check my GameJolt's page : https://gamejolt.com/@Mathiouza)

Special thanks to my friend MisterHik ! He is the best bug tracker, game tester of the all wild west ! Or ... just of all my friends, but that's good too !
